project.name: C-C543A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C543A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are files to be read (also to delay execution), and data is an integer to count up to to exercise the blocking queue that contains the weakness. This weakness uses a singleton pattern to initiate a blocking queue that has the possibility of returning multiple instances of the queue if a thread attempts to initialize the queue while another is thread inside the initializer, but has not yet allocated memory for the queue.

process.script: if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C543A-SUBV-10-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF20-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are files to be read (also to delay execution), and data is an integer to count up to to exercise the blocking queue that contains the weakness. This weakness uses a singleton pattern to initiate a blocking queue that has the possibility of returning multiple instances of the queue if a thread attempts to initialize the queue while another is thread inside the initializer, but has not yet allocated memory for the queue.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
